items.content_text:
I want another micropost here

with multiple lines

and more stuff

What about adding images?

While I’ve come within proximity of the issue, it’s finally time I dive into the CRLF line endings problem. This article is a good deep dive:

https://www.aleksandrhovhannisyan.com/blog/crlf-vs-lf-normalizing-line-endings-in-git/
